name: The Job Interview
description:
The Job Interview game is my own perspective on an issue that touches me dearly. It also lends itself to allow me to share my thoughts, experience and humour on a sensitive subject, taking a contemporary look with the use of narrative fiction-based techniques and the excellent Twine game engine to bring it to life. Feel free to play the game by clicking on the link.
Interactive fiction has been around in various forms from adventure books to video games (a most famous example of a text based adventure game that is a form of fiction is Zork and has its place in video game history). Though they have even morphed over the ages to form various sub genres like the very special What Remains of Edith Finch (which is referred to as a walking simulator), it is essentially at its heart, a narrative driven story.
